ROOT:
-- DaoSuppliers_S3_Update -- 2013/1/10 日立 太郎 UPDATE [Suppliers] SET
[SupplierID] = @Set_SupplierID_forUPD, [CompanyName] = @Set_CompanyName_forUPD, [ContactName] = @Set_ContactName_forUPD, [ContactTitle] = @Set_ContactTitle_forUPD, [Address] = @Set_Address_forUPD, [City] = @Set_City_forUPD, [Region] = @Set_Region_forUPD, [PostalCode] = @Set_PostalCode_forUPD, [Country] = @Set_Country_forUPD, [Phone] = @Set_Phone_forUPD, [Fax] = @Set_Fax_forUPD, [HomePage] = @Set_HomePage_forUPD,
WHERE [SupplierID] = @SupplierID
